title: Odd lag on ARAM (+lol players being lol players -.-)
body:
I just tried to play an aram game, but I got this really weird lag. I randomly couldnt move or cast abilities anymore. Meanwhile, everyone around me could move and act normally and it would display it normally too. What made it even weirder, was that my ping was normal and the fact that I could type normally. Later at some moments, I could move and cast abilities normally again but it would stop again after about 10 seconds. 

Additionally, our Zilean was experiencing a different kind of lag, his ping was normal but he would still have a 2-3 second delay on all of his actions while everything else was moving normally(apart from me)


and in the video you can see how nicely the other team handles the situation :)

EDIT: video didnt upload properly so here is a reupload: https://plays.tv/s/LX_s7GR9ffwu

replies.body: Heya, I agree with Kokua that the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can give us a solid overview as it does sound like packet loss.  A lot of these issues are also probably being caused by using Plays.tv.  I highly recommend uninstalling it to rule it out as a possibility!  Let me know if that helps.
I personally don't think its due to plays.tv because I have never had such lags before. I'll try playing without it for the weekend though, to see if it prevents it from happening again
You might want to check out the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) and see if you have issues with packet loss.

I played a game in practise mode after and didnt have any issues there.
The log reader says The packet loss started towards the end of the game, while I had issues the whole game
